attributes.review: i was trying to find some redeeming qualities in this shell of a man but i could not find any it took 4 weeks to even just download the app and when i could finally open the app a long screeching noise was heard which sent my grandma (who has dementia) running toward the road the tried stop her but donald trump him self held me down and made me watch my own grandma get hit by a car
attributes.title: hit my grandma with a car😡

attributes.review: I opened the app and almost immediately my dog ran away. I deleted the app as fast as I could and my dog came running back home. So please if you love your pet don’t download the 🤡Trump🤡 app or they will run away. 🤢🤮🤮🤮🤢
attributes.title: Absolute garbage

attributes.review: I downloaded this app with the intent of following my BELOVED JUICY ORANGE DONALD TRUMPPPP🥴🥴🥴🥴🥴🤤🤤🥴. Anyways, I was so dissatisfied with this app man, like my phone CRASHED after being on it for two minutes, and I think I have a freaking virus wth. Anyways, Apple should just get RID OF THIS ATROCIOUS APP. Thanks!😊
attributes.title: I can’t believe this...

attributes.review: This app is so bad it end up tracking where me and my kids live. I keep getting people texting me they know where I live and where I work. Well it is run by a orange after all
attributes.title: The app

attributes.review: This app was horrible I don’t even know why they have it. It took so long to download when it usually takes like 3 seconds for an app to download ughh such a bad app it glitches very bad😒
attributes.title: Such a bad app

attributes.review: I don't know why I downloaded this app but it was the worst decision i could have ever made. The notifications are very annoying and the overall app is very glitchy and doesn't really do anything. It is THE WORST app ever.
attributes.title: DONT DOWNLOAD

attributes.review: I got this app and not only did my power go out but my dog died. This app is so bad. I got 27 viruses and I had to get a new phone completely. Wow. Very ashamed with the trump administration. I was gonna vote Donald dump 2020 but now I can’t. 0/10 review. Boooooo. -Hugh ganus
attributes.title: This app is awful

attributes.review: it took 3 months to download slowed down everything on my phone, and made it really laggy. Not to mention it also cause a virus that almost made me lose all my personal data! this app is TERRIBLE
attributes.title: DO NOT DOWNLOAD

attributes.review: this app made my phone glitch out. i had put all my personal info that they asked for and i kept on getting notifications! this app sells your data! do NOT get this app!
attributes.title: do NOT get!!

attributes.review: I thought signing up for this would give me more information on his rally’s and other stuff for his election. It was only about what he does on his daily life. Talk about boring.
attributes.title: I am tired of this app
